revision.text:
{{Infobox dungeon |name = Dark Cave |image = [[File:Dark Cave.png|thumb]] |caption = A map of Dark Cave. |tokens = 6,500 |location = Between Route 45 and 46, south of Blackthorn City. }} '''Dark Cave''' is a [[Dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Johto]]. It initially has 36 tiles arranged in a 6x6 square, including 6 chest tiles, 15 non-boss encounter tiles, and 1 boss encounter tile. Wild Encounters have 127,000 HP.
== Encounter Tables ==
===Wild Encounters===
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! colspan=2|Trainers |- ! Encounter !! Trainer !! Pokémon Team |- | [[File:Zubat.png|40px]] Zubat || colspan=2 rowspan=5|<center>N/A |- | [[File:Geodude.png|40px]] Geodude |- | [[File:Golbat.png|40px]] Golbat |- | [[File:Graveler.png|40px]] Graveler |- | [[File:Wobbuffet.png|40px]] Wobbuffet |}
===Boss Encounters=== {| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! Base Health !! Boss Trainer !! Pokémon Team !! Base Health |- | [[File:Dunsparce.png|40px]] Dunsparce || <center> 460,000 || colspan=3|<center>N/A |- |}

<tabs> <tab name="No Debuff"> {| class="wikitable" |- ! Chest Item !! <tab name="Debuff"> After Reaching Unova, the drop chance for items in Johto will be debuffed for any loot with a Tier rarer than Rare (ie: Epic, Legendary, Mythic).
